lead_paragraph: PAPERT--Fred. Paul Travis and Washington Square Partners mourn the passing of Fred Papert. Fred left an indelible mark on the city he loved. From fighting to save Grand Central to being the pioneer in the revitalization of Times Square, he changed the course of New York City. He believed that a great city was marked by the intersection of history, culture and growth, most notable in the development of Theatre Row on West 42nd Street which stands as his legacy. He will be missed. Paul Travis, Washington Square Partners 1/3
